#text=Some people view flying in an airplane as a chore , but I truly enjoy it .
#text=Finding the best fare and route to meet your needs is a very important first step , and I usually utilize various travel websites to ensure I 'm getting the best possible deal .
#text=On the day of my flight I go to the airport with plenty of time to check in luggage and get through security checks .
#text=Having traveled before , I know this can be quite time consuming , so I try to be there at least an hour and a half before boarding time .
#text=Once I 'm through security I head towards my gate .
#text=If I have time I may stop for a snack or some shopping , though I make sure to keep an ear out for my flight to be called for boarding .
#text=Once I am called , I patiently and orderly wait my turn to enter the airplane .
#text=I place my carry on in the assigned bin , take my seat , get a book out and make myself as comfortable as possible .
#text=If I 'm correctly prepared , flying can be a wholly pleasant experience .
